data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module seems to fit the IO:: space, as it inherits from
    IO::Socket::INET.

    Net::FTP provides an interface to the FTP data connection, but one
    must go through a number of steps to use it. This module provides s
    simple method to handle the common (at least here) use cases.
